text: John and his brother Charles praying behind their father John of Berry (1375/1376–1397), count of Montpensier (1386–1401), was a French nobleman. He was the son of John, Duke of Berry and Joanna of Armagnac. He had no children and predeceased his father. He married twice: #in 1386 at Saint-Ouen to Catherine of France (1378 † 1388), daughter of Charles V and of Joanna of Bourbon #in 1390 to Anne de Bourbon-La Marche (1380–1408), daughter of John I, Count of La Marche and Vendôme, and Catherine de Vendôme. ==References== ==Sources== * Category:1376 births Category:1397 deaths Category:House of Valois Category:House of Bourbon-Montpensier Category:Counts of Montpensier
title: John of Valois, Count of Montpensier
